message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product and would like to propose a price of $10000.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. It's a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can reach a more reasonable price. I am willing to pay $11000 for the product.
I'm glad you're willing to negotiate further. I can meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $13000?
I understand your position, but I still believe we can find a middle ground. I am willing to pay $12000 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make a decent profit. I can do $13500, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I am willing to pay $12500 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $14000. This is my final offer, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to pay $13000 for the product.
